data.event: (Informally Ilocos includes those areas that speak the Ilocano language outside of the official Ilocos Region.) San Fernando became a city by virtue of R.A. 8509 signed into law on February 13, 1998 and ratified on March 20, 1998 by a plebiscite.

(Informally Ilocos includes those areas that speak the Ilocano language outside of the official Ilocos Region.) San Fernando became a city by virtue of R.A. 8509 signed into law on February 13, 1998 and ratified on March 20, 1998 by a plebiscite.
San Fernando was founded in 1786 and was named after Saint Ferdinand III of Castile.
